templates.title: Nextcloud
templates.description: Nextcloud with MariaDB and Redis. A self-hosted productivity platform with file sync, sharing, and collaboration features.

env.name: NEXTCLOUD_ADMIN_USER
env.label: Nextcloud Admin Username
env.description: The username for the Nextcloud admin account.

env.name: NEXTCLOUD_ADMIN_PASSWORD
env.label: Nextcloud Admin Password
env.description: The password for the Nextcloud admin account.

env.name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
env.label: MariaDB Root Password
env.description: The root password for the MariaDB instance.

env.name: MYSQL_DATABASE
env.label: MariaDB Database Name
env.description: The name of the database to create for Nextcloud.

env.name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
env.label: MariaDB Password
env.description: The password for the Nextcloud database user.

env.name: REDIS_PASSWORD
env.label: Redis Password
env.description: The password for the Redis instance used for caching and file locking.

env.name: NEXTCLOUD_PORT
env.label: Nextcloud Port
env.description: The host port to expose Nextcloud on.

env.name: NEXTCLOUD_TRUSTED_DOMAINS
env.label: Trusted Domains
env.description: Space-separated list of trusted domains for Nextcloud.
